question: im 16 i have been skinny all my life , i have never ever had to try to lose weight i have always been thin , but since i have had diabetes ( 2 years) im noticing a change in my weight , my blood sugar is quite bad and i do take quite alot of insulin ( 24 unitsnovo mix 30)  , i need help on ways i can control my blood sugar and help me lose weight at the same time , i would also like to avoid carbs i know thats a difficult thing for a diabetic but they make me gain more weight :( ??
title: losing weight with type 1 diabetes
